roleset.name: to join (metals) by applying heat
roleset.note: WELD-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls preparing-26.3-2, shake-22.3-2-1. (from weld.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: GM lawyers have been working with technicians to develop more uniform welding procedures -- the way [0]-3 [a vehicle]-1 is welded [*-1] [*T*-3] has a lot to do with its durability .

example.name: both args, plus some extras
example.text: I then welded a plate to the jack base with some small pieces fencing
example.arg: with some small pieces of fencing.
